creator: felix.schumacher@internetallee.de
text:
Created attachment 34461
Guard Exception handler against null messages

When reporting illegal arguments the H2 driver does not set a message, which leads to a NPE and a falsely true sample result. The attached patch guards the exception handler against this.

creator: felix.schumacher@internetallee.de
